channel.title: Graphs on μβ
channel.description: Recent content in Graphs on μβ

item.title: JuliaGraphs contributions
item.description: Starting from a weird Kaggle side-project during the Chrismas holidays, I gradually got involved in the JuliaGraphs ecosystem. After some discussion on the Julia Slack #graphs channel, I went from reporting a simple feature I needed to helping with the re-organization by splitting out two packages: LightGraphsMatching.jl LightGraphsFlows.jl I also implemented the min-cost flow problem formulated as a linear optimization problem formulated using MathProgBase.jl, using any user-provided solver.
